message: Let's split it fairly, 60-40. What do you say?
I'll take 80, you can have the rest, no negotiations
I'll give you a bit more, but I need something better than 40. Can we meet in the middle?
I'll take 90, you can have the scraps, it's my last offer
Let's call it a draw. We're both getting close to nothing, so let's split it 50-50 and end this.
